verbose_text: Our results from the proteasomal activity assays indicate that analog # 12 of curcumin when combined with bortezomib could extensively inhibit the CT like, trypsin like and PGPH like activities of the cellular proteasome (XREF_FIG).
evidence: curcumin when combined with bortezomib could extensively inhibit the CT-like, trypsin-like and PGPH-like
